issue.title: [CF 1656] Temporary icon
issue.body:
Hello. How do I set up the skill icon to appear on the screen and then disappear without my having to use the ability, that is, just to let me know that the skill is ready?


> Posted by CurseForge user Malakoy69 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1656 | Raw

comments.body:
Make a Condition Icon. Add a condition to the icon that your ability is ready. Add an On Succeed timer. Enable "Only show if timer is active".

Set both opacity settings to 100% (or whatever your desired percentage is).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
